name: Best Kept Secret

config_properties.name: Best Kept Secret
config_properties.description: An indie music festival in Hilvarenbeek, Netherlands, featuring alternative, indie rock, and electronic music.

ai_profile:
**Best Kept Secret 2026: A Celebration of Diversity and Genre Fusion**

Best Kept Secret 2026 continues its legacy as a melting pot of genres and cultures, bringing together 52 artists from 16 countries. With acts hailing from the USA, the Netherlands, the UK, and as far afield as Ghana, South Africa, and Brazil, the festival offers a truly global stage. The lineup reflects a rich tapestry of sounds, from the pulsating beats of electronic and house to the raw edge of post-punk and the soulful rhythms of R&B and Afrobeat.

Diversity takes center stage, not just in geography but also in representation. The lineup features artists of various genders, with a mix of male, female, non-binary, and mixed-gender groups, as well as 12 performers identifying as people of color. This inclusivity is mirrored in the festival’s genre-spanning curation, which blends the familiar—indie rock, alternative rock, and hip-hop—with niche sounds like Afro-psychedelic funk, minimal synth, and traditional South African music. Notably, the festival also highlights emerging talent alongside established acts, with an average artist rating of 7.2 and several highly acclaimed performers scoring 9+.

Known for its eclecticism, Best Kept Secret 2026 invites music lovers to discover new sounds and celebrate shared connections through music. Whether it’s dancing to electronic beats, swaying to dream pop, or moshing to hardcore punk, the festival promises an unforgettable experience for all. With Spotify links available for every act, attendees can dive into the lineup and prepare for a weekend of boundary-pushing artistry and global unity.
